name: Fix for Compact Tube (White)
description:
Youtube Playlist Header Fix for Compact Tube (White) v1.5.0 (style 186936).
While Compact Tube makes the playlist videos black, it does not make the headers black. This is a fix for this.
additional_info:
Compact Tube (White) v1.5.0: https://userstyles.org/styles/186936/
I DO NOT own Compact Tube, not is any of the code used in my code. This is an entirely seperate style, made only to make my experience with Compact Tube better. I am sharing this so more people can have a better experience.

I made this because I wanted to fix the white headers that I have while uding the Compact Tube (White). This was made solely for fun, not any gain or educational purposes. I have no idea who owns CSS, but this is set under public domain, and I just copied this from the youtube CSS. I am definitely not a pro at CSS, so it may be sloppy.

This will only be updated if it stops working, or if the code is bad. 

Current version: 0.1 Alpha

The Screenshots are in Black and White so the text pops more.
